name: hume-ai
title: Hume AI
description: Understand emotions in text with Hume's state-of-the-art emotional expression models.
author: vintners

commands.name: ask-hume
commands.title: Ask Hume
commands.subtitle: Get emotional expression results from the Hume API
commands.description: Query the Hume streaming API with the current text in the clipboard to get a sentiment analysis.
